headline: Space race investing: What to know about the growing sector
summary: The space race is heating up, with Blue Origin, SpaceX (SPAX.PVT), Rocketlab, and Amazon (AMZN) Project Kuiper each making significant strides. Andrew Chanin, co-founder and CEO of ProcureAM, joins Catalysts to discuss new developments, competition, and diversification in the launch industry, as well as space race satellite companies to keep an eye on. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Bullish Notes Issued on Amazon (AMZN), JPMorgan (JPM)
summary: Investment banks JMP Securities and CFRA today issued bullish notes on Amazon (AMZN) and JPMorgan (JPM), respectively. However, both banks cut their price targets on each of the stocks.
